name: NODE_ENV
description: Sets application environment (development/production) for logging and features

name: PORT
description: Server port (Railway may override this)

name: TZ
description: Timezone for logging and date operations

name: PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL
description: Public URL of backend API for documentation and client configuration

name: CORS_ORIGIN
description: Comma-separated list of allowed frontend origins (no trailing slash)

name: WEB_ORIGIN
description: Alias for CORS_ORIGIN if preferred

name: DATABASE_URL
description: Prisma database connection string (MySQL format: mysql://user:pass@host:port/db)

name: SHADOW_DATABASE_URL
description: Optional shadow database URL for Prisma migrations on hosted databases

name: JWT_SECRET
description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens (min 32 chars in production)

name: JWT_EXPIRES_IN
description: JWT token expiration time (e.g., '7d', '24h')

name: JWT_ISS
description: JWT issuer claim for token validation

name: JWT_AUD
description: JWT audience claim for token validation

name: SESSION_SECRET
description: Secret for signing session cookies (min 32 chars in production)

name: COOKIE_SECURE
description: Set to 'true' for HTTPS-only cookies (required for production cross-site)

name: COOKIE_SAME_SITE
description: SameSite cookie policy ('none' for cross-site, requires Secure=true)

name: LOG_LEVEL
description: Logging verbosity level (debug, info, warn, error)

name: RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS
description: Rate limit window in milliseconds (optional)

name: RATE_LIMIT_MAX
description: Maximum requests per window (optional)

name: MAX_UPLOAD_MB
description: Maximum file upload size in MB (optional)

name: SMTP_HOST
description: SMTP server hostname for sending emails

name: SMTP_PORT
description: SMTP server port (usually 587 for TLS, 465 for SSL)

name: SMTP_SECURE
description: Use TLS/SSL for SMTP connection

name: SMTP_USER
description: SMTP authentication username

name: SMTP_PASS
description: SMTP authentication password (SECRET)

name: SMTP_FROM
description: Sender email address and name

name: S3_ENDPOINT
description: S3-compatible storage endpoint URL

name: S3_REGION
description: AWS region for S3 bucket

name: S3_BUCKET
description: S3 bucket name for file uploads

name: S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID
description: AWS access key for S3 (SECRET)

name: S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
description: AWS secret key for S3 (SECRET)

name: REDIS_URL
description: Redis connection URL (redis://user:pass@host:port)

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
description: Backend API base URL (exposed to browser, no trailing slash)

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV
description: Environment identifier for frontend logging and features

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_EMAIL
description: Demo email for quick login (development only)

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_PASSWORD
description: Demo password for quick login (development only)

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_FEATURE_FLAG_RESERVATIONS
description: Enable/disable reservations feature

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_FEATURE_FLAG_COMMUNITIES
description: Enable/disable communities feature

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_GTAG_ID
description: Google Analytics tracking ID

name: NEXT_PUBLIC_HOTJAR_ID
description: Hotjar tracking ID for user session recording
